name: pswebpkfunda
description: ``` module.exports ={     entry:"./app.js",     output:{         filename:"bundle.js"     } } ``` ######4 watch - manually ``` webpack --watch ``` - config ``` module.exports ={     entry:"./app.js",     output:{         filename:"bundle.js"     },     watch: true } ``` install devserver ``` npm install -g webpack-dev-server ``` run server ``` webpack-dev-server ``` run server concisely ``` webpack-dev-server ```
